textAndButtonBannerData.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Cross-Border B2B Commerce?
textAndButtonBannerData.ctaDescription: Decentro empowers B2B marketplaces, wholesalers, manufacturers, and trade platforms to move money across borders with unmatched speed, predictability, and automation.

data.text: Enable global supplier onboarding, escrow-style settlements, multi-currency acceptance, commission deduction, credit terms, and automated payouts across markets.
Manage high-value, recurring orders with real-time FX handling, PO-linked payments, partial settlements, and bulk vendor disbursements.
Handle international trade cycles with milestone-based payments (production → shipment → delivery), multi-currency cash positions, and custom financing integrations.
Enable buyers to source globally with local payment options, automated invoice matching, credit line-based settlements, and FX optimization.
Pay logistics partners, freight companies, customs brokers, and last-mile networks using automated rules linked to order and shipment status.
Support usage-based billing, renewals, invoice-based collections, and real-time reconciliation across currencies and countries.
